reasons_to_visit.details: Castle gardens reopen and spring flowers begin blooming throughout the historic town.
Pleasant temperatures perfect for walking the medieval streets without summer heat or winter cold.
Pre-peak season means easier access to attractions and more intimate experiences.
Traditional Easter markets and celebrations add cultural richness to your visit.
Longer days and spring lighting provide excellent conditions for capturing the town's beauty.

reasons_to_avoid.details: April weather can be unpredictable with occasional rain showers and temperature fluctuations.
Rafting and canoeing may not yet be fully operational depending on weather conditions.
Certain seasonal outdoor attractions may still be preparing for full season operation.
